title: OMM 09 : Start the day by Stopping! Using morning rituals to energise, uplift and liberate your day
dc:creator: Team Tham
description:
The way we start our day is the way we live our day.  Today Vikki and Natalie explore the power and potential in training our mental muscle first thing in the morning.

The post OMM 09 : Start the day by Stopping! Using morning rituals to energise, uplift and liberate your day appeared first on The Wellness Couch.
